general.name: Atul Parida
general.headline: Software Engineer | Data Scientist | AI/ML Enthusiast
about: I'm Atul, a software engineer and data scientist from Austin passionate about building impactful tech.
I craft scalable data pipelines, AI applications, and full-stack solutions across fintech and automation sectors.
When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring photography, hiking, or diving into the latest tech trends.
Let's connect and create something amazing together! ðŸš€

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description: Working with Visa's Payments Platform team to build scalable payment processing systems and enhance transaction security using microservices architecture.

experiences.title: Junior Software Developer
experiences.description: Helped bring Hitachi's VSP 360 enterprise data platform for AI-driven data management solutions to general availability (GA), focusing on scalable platform engineering and full-stack development.

experiences.title: Data Science Intern
experiences.description: Developed scalable ETL pipelines and predictive models, improving forecasting accuracy by 40% and driving data-driven insights.

experiences.title: Undergraduate Researcher
experiences.description: Conducted research on computer vision and deep learning for analyzing marine ecosystems, collaborating closely with faculty and peers.

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.description: Designed AI-driven tools for content summarization and developed front-end components using React and Redux.

experiences.title: Software System Test Engineer Intern
experiences.description: Conducted system testing and performance analysis for automotive analytics and infotainment systems.

experiences.title: Operations Intern
experiences.description: Improved robot scripting to reduce plotter energy overhead by 30%, and improve plotting speeds through automation scripting by up to 50%.

experiences.title: UI/UX Designer Intern
experiences.description: Conducted UX research, interviewed stakeholders and designed interfaces for vehicle management applications using Sketch and Figma.

education.subject: Computer Science
education.university: Singapore University of Technology and Design (SUTD)
education.description: Minor in Artificial Intelligence, focus on Software Engineering and Financial Technologies. Graduated with Honors with Merit.

volunteering.description: Led a 150-member club focused on iOS/macOS app development and organized coding events and workshops.
Managed events and workshops promoting photography and creative expression.
